scenarios.title: User can successfully register a 5G broadband plan
scenarios.given: User is on the 5G broadband pricing page with all UI elements loaded
scenarios.when: User clicks on any '立即登記' button
scenarios.then: User is navigated to the registration form page or modal

scenarios.title: All '立即登記' buttons are clickable and respond to clicks
scenarios.given: User is on the pricing page with 119 buttons rendered
scenarios.when: User clicks each '立即登記' button sequentially
scenarios.then: Each button triggers the expected registration action without errors

scenarios.title: Keyboard navigation allows focus on all interactive elements
scenarios.given: User is on the pricing page using keyboard only
scenarios.then: Focus moves sequentially and visibly to all buttons, links, and custom controls in a logical order

scenarios.title: All interactive elements have appropriate ARIA labels for screen readers
scenarios.given: User is using a screen reader on the pricing page
scenarios.when: Screen reader navigates through buttons and custom controls
scenarios.then: Each element announces a meaningful label describing its purpose

scenarios.title: Page meets minimum contrast ratio for text and interactive elements
scenarios.given: User views the pricing page under normal lighting conditions
scenarios.when: User inspects text and button colors
scenarios.then: All text and interactive elements have contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 against background

scenarios.title: Input fields prevent XSS injection in registration form
scenarios.given: User is on the registration form page after clicking '立即登記'
scenarios.when: User inputs malicious scripts (e.g., <script>alert(1)</script>) into any text field and submits
scenarios.then: Input is sanitized and no script is executed; user sees validation error if applicable

scenarios.title: Registration form is protected against CSRF attacks
scenarios.given: User is authenticated or unauthenticated on the registration page
scenarios.when: A CSRF attack attempt is made to submit the registration form
scenarios.then: Request is rejected or requires valid anti-CSRF token; no unauthorized registration occurs

scenarios.title: Input fields prevent SQL injection via registration form
scenarios.given: User is on the registration form page
scenarios.when: User inputs SQL injection payloads (e.g., ' OR '1'='1') into text fields and submits
scenarios.then: Input is sanitized or parameterized queries prevent injection; no database errors or data leaks occur

scenarios.title: Handles maximum number of button clicks without performance degradation
scenarios.given: User is on the pricing page with 119 buttons rendered
scenarios.when: User rapidly clicks all '立即登記' buttons multiple times
scenarios.then: Page remains responsive and no UI crashes or slowdowns occur

scenarios.title: Handles boundary values for numeric inputs in registration form
scenarios.given: User is on the registration form page with numeric input fields (e.g., phone number, ID)
scenarios.when: User inputs minimum, maximum, and out-of-bound values
scenarios.then: System validates inputs correctly, accepts valid boundary values, and rejects invalid ones with clear error messages
